abstract: Walter B Gerken, main founder of Pacific Investment Management Company, known as Pimco, who grew company into world's largest bond fund, dies at age 93.
lead_paragraph: The former chairman and chief executive of Pacific Life Insurance, he decided to turn the company’s investment arm into a separate subsidiary that would manage outside money.

headline.main: Walter Gerken, Who Helped Found Pimco, Is Dead at 93
headline.print_headline: Walter Gerken, 93, Creator of What Became Pimco Fund

snippet: The former chairman and chief executive of Pacific Life Insurance, he decided to turn the company’s investment arm into a separate subsidiary that would manage outside money.
